name: Violation Open
definition: The violation is active and still requires action from the owner or the violation has been properly certified and is pending the statutory period for reinspection or dismissal.

name: Notice of Violation Sent Out
definition: The Notice of Violation was sent to the registered owner or "Owner of the Premises".

name: Notice of Violation Certified On Time
definition: The violation was certified as corrected by the Owner on time and properly.

name: Notice of Violation Certified Late
definition: The violation was certified as corrected by the Owner but was not submitted to HPD in a timely manner. Therefore, the certification was not acceptable.

name: Certification Postponement Granted
definition: The property owner applied to HPD to extend the correction date for the violation, and HPD granted the request.  The new correction and certification date is in the columns NEW CORRECT BY DATE and  NEW CERT BY DATE.

name: Certification Postponement Denied
definition: The property owner applied to HPD to extend the correction date for the violation, and HPD denied the request.  The condition must be corrected by the original correction date.

name: False Certification
definition: The violation was certified as corrected by the Owner on time and properly.  A subsequent re-inspection of the condition by HPD found that condition had not been properly corrected.  The violation is open and is subject to civil penalties for false certification.

name: Violation Will Be Reinspected
definition: HPD will be attempting to reinspect this violation.

name: Defect Letter Issued
definition: The violation condition was observed corrected by the Department.  However, documentation required to close the violation has not yet been received and the violation remains open.

name: Not Complied With
definition: A reinspection of the violation found that the condition still exists as of the status date.

name: First No Access To Reinspect Violation
definition: HPD attempted to reinspect the violation but there was no access.  The violation remains open.

name: Second No Access to Reinspect Violation
definition: HPD made a second attempt to reinspect the violation but there was no access.  The violation remains open.

name: Violation Reopen
definition: The violation was returned to open status from closed.

name: Info Notice of Violation Sent Out
definition: Info NOVs are notice that an order has been issued by the Department.  These orders do not have associated certification or correction dates and are used to serve notice upon current and future owners regarding open agency Orders.

name: Invalid Certfication
definition: A certification has been submitted but was not acceptable due to a defect in the certification documentation.
